scripts.dev: npm run kill-ports && concurrently --kill-others-on-fail --names "BACKEND,FRONTEND,ELECTRON" --prefix-colors "blue,green,yellow" "npm run backend" "npm run frontend" "npm run electron"
scripts.backend: cd backend && source ../venv/bin/activate && python -m uvicorn main:app --reload --port 8000 --host 0.0.0.0
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install
